document.docAuthor: Dellapé, Pablo Matías, Martínez, Auria Paula & Coscarón, María Del Carmen
document.masterDocTitle: New distributional records for the asopine pentatomids in temperate South America

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: New distributional records for the asopine pentatomids in temperate South America

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution : Argentina , Bolivia , Brazil , Paraguay , Peru , Surinam , and Uruguay .

Observations : Besides the characters mentioned by
Thomas ( 1992 )
we observed that some specimens have 3 ­ 5 stripes yellow, orange or red, the rest black or brown.
